title: Our Team | UPLIFT
description: Meet the talented individuals behind UPLIFT TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD. - passionate developers, designers, and innovators building the future of software solutions.

hero.title: Meet Our Team
hero.subtitle: The brilliant minds behind innovative solutions
hero.description: Our diverse team of experts combines technical excellence with creative vision to deliver exceptional software solutions.

founders.name: Anon Suphatphon
founders.title: Founder & CEO
founders.description: A young engineer and entrepreneur who grew from freelancing on ERP, POS, and Booking Platform projects to establishing a full-scale company. Experienced in designing systems for various business types.
founders.vision: Born from frustration watching projects fail because teams didn't truly understand the business - just following specs and moving on. I decided to build a different kind of Software House - one that cares about both clients and team members, creating software that actually works, not just sounds good.

founders.name: Pisitvet Somsub
founders.title: Co-Founder & Head of Sales
founders.role: Strategic marketing, customer relationship building, and bridging technology with business needs
founders.description: Sales and marketing expert with extensive experience in brand building and digital market development. Focuses on understanding customer needs and value proposition to drive continuous business growth.
founders.vision: Business success comes from genuine listening to customers and building authentic relationships, while delivering solutions that provide real value and long-term impact.

founders.name: Pattapon Tanankakorn
founders.title: Co-Founder & Head of AI Engineer & Data Scientist
founders.description: AI Engineer with Master's degree from Skolkovo Institute of Science and Technology, Russia. Specializing in data modeling, machine learning, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and LLM implementation. Expert in transforming complex data into intelligent business solutions.
founders.vision: AI should enhance human capabilities, not replace them. Building intelligent systems that understand context and deliver meaningful insights to drive business innovation.

founders.name: Supawit Srichompoo
founders.title: Chief Technology Officer
founders.description: Seasoned CTO with 7+ years of industry experience across diverse technology landscapes. Expert in Full-Stack Development, DevOps, microservices architecture, data warehouse design, cloud infrastructure, and enterprise-scale system development.
founders.vision: Technology leadership means building systems that scale with business growth while maintaining reliability, security, and performance. Creating technology foundations that enable long-term success.

founders.name: Thirawut Khanphan
founders.title: Tech Lead & Hardware Engineer
founders.description: Tech Lead with expertise in both software and hardware development. Specializes in IoT systems design, Embedded Systems, and hardware-software integration. Leads teams in developing solutions that seamlessly blend hardware and software technologies.
founders.vision: The seamless integration of hardware and software is key to creating innovative solutions that deliver real business value. Designing systems that bridge the physical and digital worlds without boundaries.
